text.0: call we for aid on indra mitra varuṇa and agni and the marut host and aditi.
text.1: even as a chariot from a difficult ravine bountiful vasus rescue us from all distress.
text.2: come ye Ādityas for our full prosperity in conquests of the foe ye gods bring joy to us.
text.3: even as a chariot from a difficult ravine bountiful vasus rescue us from all distress.
text.4: may the most glorious fathers aid us and the two goddesses mothers of the gods who strengthen law.
text.5: even as a chariot from a difficult ravine bountiful vasus rescue us from all distress.
text.6: to mighty narāśaṁsa strengthening his might to pūṣan ruler over men we pray with hymns.
text.7: even as a chariot from a difficult ravine bountiful vasus rescue us from all distress.
text.8: bṛhaspati make us evermore an easy path we crave what boon thou hast for men in rest and stir.
text.9: like as a chariot from a difficult ravine bountiful vasus rescue us from all distress.
text.10: sunk in the pit the Ṛṣi kutsa called to aid indra the vṛtraslayer lord of power and might.
text.11: even as a chariot from a difficult ravine bountiful vasus rescue us from all distress.
text.12: may aditi the goddess guard us with the gods may the protecting god keep us with ceaseless care.
text.13: this prayer of ours may varuṇa grant and mitra and aditi and sindhu earth and heaven.
